title: Antonio Brown, Steelers, Raiders, and LeBron James
itunes:title: Antonio Brown, Steelers, Raiders, and LeBron James
description:
Colin discusses the Pittsburgh Steelers dysfunction and them trading WR Antonio Brown to the Oakland Raiders, the latest NFL news, and why the Los Angeles Lakers should consider trading F LeBron James. Guests include Jay Glazer, Chris Broussard, Brian Scalabrine, and Dahntay Jones.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
